alert.note: Alert for Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 31 at 11:10AM EDT until August 04 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River at Heidelberg affecting Lee County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Kentucky River at Heidelberg. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 18.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue to run high through Thursday. - Action stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. The next statement will be issued by 6 pm EDT this evening.
